meanings.definition: The quality of being quick or sharp in perception or understanding.
meanings.sent1: His glegness in solving puzzles impressed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The detective's glegness helped him solve the case in record time.
meanings.sent3: The glegness of the cat in catching the mouse was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent4: Her glegness in finding the hidden treasure was like a superpower.
meanings.sent5: The glegness of the student in grasping complex concepts amazed the teacher.

meanings.definition: The state of being alert or keenly observant.
meanings.sent1: The hiker's glegness saved him from stepping on a snake.
meanings.sent2: The security guard's glegness prevented any unauthorized entry.
meanings.sent3: The glegness of the owl in spotting its prey was fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her glegness at noticing small details was like having a built-in radar.
meanings.sent5: The glegness of the lifeguard in spotting the struggling swimmer was commendable.
